name: Awe - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A lock of hair from a fey, taken in amicable bargain for Charming or in violence for Threatening

description: Awe: When you start this project, choose either Charming or Threatening. If you choose Charming, you gain an edge on Presence tests made to win over creatures over or make a good impression. If you choose Threatening, you gain an edge on Presence tests made to intimidate, coerce, or bully.

name: Damage Immunity I - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Elemental sand left behind when an elemental enters Orden from Quintessence

description: Damage Immunity I: When you start this project, select three damage types. You have immunity 5 to those damage types.

name: Disguise - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement
description: Disguise: You can use a maneuver to cause this armor to take the form of any type of clothing that you have been in the presence of‚Äîa noble's dress, a guard's uniform, a cutpurse's robes, and so forth. The armor loses none of its protective qualities while transformed into other clothing.

name: Iridescent - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement
description: Iridescent: When you are the sole target of an ability, you can use a free triggered action to reveal that the ability was targeting an afterimage of you in the same space as you. The power roll for the ability is made on an 11. You can't use this imbuement again until you earn 1 or more Victories.

name: Magic Resistance I - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement

project_source.name: Texts or lore in The First Language

description: Magic Resistance I: Your characteristic scores are treated as 1 higher (to a maximum of 2) for the purpose of resisting the potencies of magic abilities.

name: Nettlebloom - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A rose from the magical hedge of a hag

description: Nettlebloom: Whenever you are grabbed by an adjacent creature, your armor sprouts toxic nettles. While that creature has you grabbed, they are weakened.

name: Phasing I - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement
description: Phasing I: Once per turn, you can move through 1 square of solid matter. If you end your turn inside solid matter, you are forced out into the space from which you entered it and you take 5 damage that can't be reduced in any way.

name: Psionic Resistance I - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Rare crystals that resonate with psionic energy, often found at sites of psionic experimentation

description: Psionic Resistance I: Your characteristic scores are treated as 1 higher (to a maximum of 2) for the purpose of resisting the potencies of psionic abilities.

name: Swift - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The feather of a falcon slain as it was diving

description: Swift: You gain a +1 bonus to speed.

name: Tempest I - 1st-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A strip of starmetel struck by lightning

description: Tempest I: As a maneuver, you infuse this armor with the essence of a storm. The first creature to deal damage to you before the end of your next turn, they take lightning damage equal to your highest characteristic score and you can push them 1 square.

name: Absorption - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A mirror blessed by a priest of a god of magic

project_source.name: Texts or lore in The First Language

description:
Absorption: Whenever you are targeted by a magic or psionic ability that targets only one creature, you can use a free triggered action to cause this armor to absorb the ability after the ability's effects resolve. While the armor has an ability absorbed, you can't absorb another.

You can use an absorbed ability as if you knew it, making power rolls for the ability using your choice of Reason, Intuition, or Presence. You don't need to spend any Heroic Resource to activate the ability. Once you use the ability, the armor loses it, and you can absorb another.

name: Damage Immunity II - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The essence of an elemental who is still alive

description: Damage Immunity II: The damage immunity conveyed by the armor increases to 10.

name: Dragon Soul - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A scale from a dead dragon

description:
Dragon Soul: When another creature causes you to be winded or dying, you can use a free triggered action to cause the soul of a dragon to emerge from this armor and hurtle toward the creature. Make the following power roll against the creature.

**Power Roll + Your Highest Characteristic Score:**
‚Ä¢ 11 or lower: 8 damage; push 3
‚Ä¢ 12-16: 12 damage; push 4
‚Ä¢ 17+: 15 damage; push 5

name: Levitating - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A palm-sized crystal grown in the subterranean lair of an overmind

description: Levitating: On your turn, you can treat up to 5 consecutive squares of movement as flying movement. If you are still in midair at the end of your turn, you fall prone.

name: Magic Resistance II - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A scale from a mature dragon

project_source.name: Texts or lore in The First Language

description: Magic Resistance II: Your characteristic scores are treated as 2 higher (to a maximum of 3) for the purpose of resisting the potencies of magic abilities. This benefit replaces Magic Resistance I.

name: Phasing II - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The remnants of a slain ooze

description: Phasing II: When you use the armor's Phasing I imbuement, you can move through 3 squares of solid matter per turn.

name: Psionic Resistance II - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A fresh crystalline scale from a gemstone dragon

description: Psionic Resistance II: Your characteristic scores are treated as 2 higher (to a maximum of 3) for the purpose of resisting the potencies of psionic abilities. This benefit replaces Psionic Resistance I.

name: Reactive - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A complex, hand-engineered set of brass gears inscribed with runes in silver dust

description: Reactive: Whenever you take damage, you have damage immunity 2 until the end of your next turn after the triggering damage is resolved.

name: Second Wind - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement
description: Second Wind: Whenever you become winded, you can use a free triggered action to spend a Recovery.

name: Shattering - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A pound of volcanic obsidian, formed naturally as a single piece

description: Shattering: Whenever an enemy scores a critical hit against you, they take 10 sonic damage.

name: Tempest II - 5th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The armor must be laid out under a clear sky as a comet passes over

description: Tempest II: When you use the armor's Tempest I imbuement, the affected creature takes 8 lightning damage and you push them up to 3 squares.

name: Devil's Bargain - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement
description: Devil's Bargain: You can fly. Additionally, if an effect would make you prone while flying, you can choose to not go prone by losing Stamina equal to the distance you would have fallen from becoming prone.

name: Dragon Soul II - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: An offering of gems, coins, and art stolen from a dragon's hoard, sacrificed in ritual fire

description:
Dragon Soul II: While you are winded, your head transforms into a dragon's head and you have the following ability.

**Dragon's Fire**
üó≤ So great is your maw you unleash hell.
Area, Magic
üìê 5 √ó 1 line within 1 ‚åñ Each enemy in the area

**Power Roll + Your Highest Characteristic Score:**
‚Ä¢ 11 or lower: 5 fire damage
‚Ä¢ 12-16: 8 fire damage
‚Ä¢ 17+: 11 fire damage

name: Invulnerable - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Repurposed metal plates from a servok war engine

description: Invulnerable: When an ability roll made against you obtains a tier 1 outcome, you can ignore the damage and effects.

name: Leyline Walker - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A cutting from an ethereal tree that manifests in the mundane world only once a year

description: Leyline Walker: Once per turn as a move action, you can spend any amount of your movement to instead teleport that distance.

name: Life - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement

project_source.name: Texts or lore in High Kuric

description: Life: Whenever you would die, you can spend a Recovery to regain Stamina instead. If you have no Recoveries to spend, you die.

name: Magic Resistance III - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A scale from an ancient dragon

project_source.name: Texts or lore in The First Language

description: Magic Resistance III: The benefit of the armor's Magic Resistance II imbuement extends to each ally within 3 squares of you.

name: Phasing III - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Perfectly clear glass from a house that disappeared into the Ethereal Plane

description: Phasing III: Your movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks, and you can move through the space of any enemy as if they were an ally. You can't end your turn in an enemy's space.

name: Psionic Resistance III - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The skull of a voiceless talker at least a century old

description: Psionic Resistance III: The benefit of the armor's Psionic Resistance II imbuement extends to each ally within 3 squares of you.

name: Temporal Flux - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: An experimental temporal capacitor invented by the kuran zol

description:
Temporal Flux: Whenever you move out of a square, you can choose to leave an imprint that lasts until the end of the encounter, until your imprint takes 20 or more damage, or until you create a new imprint. The square is occupied by your imprint, and you can share the space with it.

On your turn, you can teleport to the imprint's space as a free maneuver. When you are targeted by an ability, you can use a free triggered action to teleport to your imprint, and the power roll for the ability is an automatic tier 1 result.

name: Unbending - 9th-Level Armor Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A spearhead or other weapon broken off in the body of a stone giant, and ossified for a year or more

project_source.name: Texts or lore in High Kuric

description: Unbending: You can't be subjected to forced movement unless you choose to be. Effects that ignore Stability also ignore this imbuement.

name: Berserking - 1st-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The tusk of a feral boar

description: Berserking: Whenever you damage a creature using a magic or psionic ability and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature must make an opportunity attack against their nearest ally if possible after the ability's effects resolve. This strike deals extra damage equal to the highest of your Reason, Intuition, or Presence scores.

name: Displacing I - 1st-Level Implement Imbuement
description: Displacing I: Whenever you damage a creature using a magic or psionic ability and obtain a tier 3 outcome, you can teleport that creature up to 3 squares after the ability's effects resolve. If the creature ends on a horizontal surface, they must end on a horizontal surface.

name: Elemental - 1st-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Ashes or other leavings from a natural disaster

project_source.name: Texts or lore in The First Language

description: Elemental: Whenever you use an ability with the Air, Earth, Fire, Green, Rot, Void, or Water keyword, you can attune this implement to that element until the end of the encounter. While the implement is attuned, you gain an edge on power rolls with that elemental keyword. The implement can be attuned to only one element at a time.

name: Forceful I - 1st-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A lead slingstone that killed a giant

project_source.name: Texts or lore in High Kuric

description: Forceful I: Whenever you use a magic or psionic ability to push or pull a creature, you can move that creature an additional 1 square.

name: Rat Form - 1st-Level Implement Imbuement
description: Rat Form: As a maneuver, you transform into a rat. Your equipment transforms with you. As a rat, you have speed 5 and can automatically climb at full speed while moving, your size is 1T, and you can see in the dark. You cannot speak and keep your stats while in rat form, but your Might is -5 and you lose all your regular abilities, features, and benefits. You can revert to your natural form as a maneuver, and do so automatically if you take any damage.

name: Rejuvenating I - 1st-Level Implement Imbuement

project_source.name: Texts or lore in The First Language

description: Rejuvenating I: Whenever you use an ability that costs 1 or more of your Heroic Resource, you roll a d10. On a 9 or higher, you gain 1 Heroic Resource.

name: Seeking - 1st-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: An inch-long needle carved from a diamond

description: Seeking: Your ranged magic or psionic abilities gain a +2 distance bonus. Additionally, if you think the name of a specific creature, place, or object to the implement, the implement points toward that target provided you are on the same world.

name: Thought Sending - 1st-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The brain of a psionic creature

description: Thought Sending: Your ranged magic and psionic abilities gain a +2 distance bonus. Additionally, you can telepathically communicate with any willing creature who knows a language and whose existence you know, provided they are on the same world as you. You must initiate the conversation, but once you do, the creature can respond until you end the conversation.

name: Warding I - 1st-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Three skulls from the same chimera

description: Warding I: You gain a +6 bonus to Stamina.

name: Celerity - 5th-Level Implement Imbuement
description: Celerity: Immediately after using a magic or psionic ability that requires a maneuver action, you can shift up to 3 squares, or you can use the Escape Grab maneuver as a free maneuver (see Maneuvers in Chapter 10: Combat).

name: Celestine - 5th-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A still-warm piece of a meteorite

description: Celestine: As a main action, you conjure up to three stars, which hover in unoccupied squares of your choice within 5 squares of you. The stars remain in place, and disappear if you create more stars. When an enemy enters any star's space, the star detonates and is destroyed, and the enemy takes 10 fire damage. If you have line of effect to the stars, you can also slide them 1 square. Otherwise, the enemy slides 1 square in a random direction.

name: Displacing II - 5th-Level Implement Imbuement
description: Displacing II: When you use the implement's Displacing I imbuement, you can teleport the creature up to 4 squares. Additionally, the creature takes a bane on their next power roll made before the end of their next turn.

name: Erupting I - 5th-Level Implement Imbuement
description: Erupting I: Whenever you damage a creature using a magic or psionic ability that targets only a single creature and obtain a tier 3 outcome, each enemy within 2 squares of the creature takes 3 fire damage after the ability's effects resolve.

name: Forceful II - 5th-Level Implement Imbuement

project_source.name: Texts or lore in High Kuric

description: Forceful II: Whenever you use a magic or psionic ability to push or pull a creature, you can move that creature an additional 1 square. This replaces the benefit of Forceful I.

name: Hallucinatory - 5th-Level Implement Imbuement
description: Hallucinatory: As a maneuver, you create an area of sensory instability in a 2 aura centered on yourself. The area is difficult terrain for your enemies until the end of the encounter.

name: Lingering I - 5th-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Slow-acting poison refined from rare fungi

description: Lingering I: Whenever you damage a creature using a magic or psionic ability and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature takes 8 damage at the start of your next turn.

name: Rejuvenating II - 5th-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A still-growing bonsai tree at least 30 years old

project_source.name: Texts or lore in The First Language

description: Rejuvenating II: Whenever you use an ability that costs 1 or more of your Heroic Resource, roll a d10. On an 8 or higher, you gain 1 Heroic Resource and you can spend a Recovery. This replaces the benefit of Rejuvenating I.

name: Warding II - 5th-Level Implement Imbuement
description: Warding II: The Stamina bonus for the Warding I imbuement becomes +12. Additionally, your characteristic scores are treated as 1 higher for the purpose of resisting potencies.

name: Anathema - 9th-Level Implement Imbuement
description: Anathema: Whenever you damage a creature using a magic or psionic ability and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature is also weakened (save ends). If the creature is within 10 squares when this weakened effect ends, you can use a free triggered action to make a free strike against them.

name: Displacing III - 9th-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The keystone from a gate used for crossing between worlds

description: Displacing III: When you use the implement's Displacing I imbuement, you can teleport the creature up to 5 squares. Additionally, the creature takes a bane on their next power roll made before the end of their next turn.

name: Erupting II - 9th-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A sealed geode containing explosive gas

description: Erupting II: The fire damage dealt by the implement's Erupting I imbuement increases to 6.

name: Forceful III - 9th-Level Implement Imbuement

project_source.name: Texts or lore in High Kuric

description: Forceful III: Whenever you use a magic or psionic ability to push or pull a creature, you can move that creature an additional 3 squares and that movement can be upward. This replaces the benefit of Forceful II.

name: Lingering II - 9th-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A venom gland from a mature dragon

description: Lingering II: Whenever you damage a creature using a magic or psionic ability and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature takes 15 damage at the start of your next turn. This replaces the benefit of Lingering I.

name: Piercing - 9th-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Black iron harvested from a slain blood elemental

description: Piercing: Your magic and psionic abilities ignore damage immunities.

name: Psionic Siphon - 9th-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The frontal lobe of an overmind

description: Psionic Siphon: Once per turn when you damage one or more creatures using a magic or psionic ability and obtain a tier 3 outcome, you gain Stamina equal to your highest characteristic score, and one creature you damage takes an extra 5 damage.

name: Rejuvenating III - 9th-Level Implement Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A live flower that blooms only once a decade

project_source.name: Texts or lore in The First Language

description: Rejuvenating III: Whenever you use an ability that costs 1 or more of your Heroic Resource, roll a d10. On a 7 or higher, you gain 1 Heroic Resource, and you or a creature of your choice within 3 squares can spend a Recovery. This replaces the benefit of Rejuvenating II.

name: Warding III - 9th-Level Implement Imbuement
description: Warding III: The Stamina bonus for the Warding I imbuement becomes +18. Additionally, you and each ally within 3 squares of you has their characteristic scores treated as 1 higher for the purpose of resisting potencies. This replaces the benefit of Warding II.

name: Blood Bargain - 1st-Level Weapon Imbuement
description: Blood Bargain: As a maneuver, you can harm yourself with the weapon, taking 1d6 damage that can't be reduced in any way. An ally within 5 squares can then spend a Recovery.

name: Chilling I - 1st-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A piece of ice from Quintessence that never melts

description: Chilling I: Whenever you damage a creature with an ability using this weapon and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature takes 3 cold damage.

name: Disrupting I - 1st-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A vial of blood from a living saint

description: Disrupting I: Whenever you damage an undead using this weapon and leave that undead with 15 Stamina or less, they drop to 0 Stamina.

name: Hurling - 1st-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A magnet made from rare metals

description: Hurling: Whenever you use a melee ability using this weapon, you can throw the weapon by treating the ability's distance as ranged 5 instead. When the ability is resolved, the weapon returns to your hand. Any ability used when you throw this weapon can't impose the grabbed or restrained conditions.

name: Merciful - 1st-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A sprig of dockwart, a rare plant with natural anesthetic properties

description: Merciful: Whenever you reduce a non-undead creature to 0 Stamina using this weapon, the creature falls unconscious and wakes up 10 minutes later. A creature with the Heal skill can wake the unconscious creature early with 1 uninterrupted minute of medical care. Whenever the creature wakes, they regain 1 Stamina.

name: Terrifying I - 1st-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The preserved, intact amygdala of a mindkiller

description: Terrifying I: Whenever you damage a creature with an ability using this weapon and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature takes 2 psychic damage.

name: Thundering I - 1st-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The heart of a lion, bear, or other large predatory animal

project_source.name: Texts or lore in Low Kuric

description: Thundering I: Whenever you deal rolled damage to a creature using this weapon, you can cause that creature or another creature who can be hit by the ability to make a solid surface, the bleeding condition ends.

name: Vengeance I - 1st-Level Weapon Imbuement
description: Vengeance I: Whenever you use a damage-dealing ability using this weapon against a creature who has dealt damage to you since the end of your last turn, the ability deals extra damage.

name: Wingbane - 1st-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The pinfeather of a giant hawk

description: Wingbane: Whenever you damage a flying creature using this weapon, that creature is also bleeding (save ends). While bleeding in this way, the creature takes 1 damage per square they fly. If the creature starts their turn on the same solid surface, the bleeding condition ends.

name: Chargebreaker - 5th-Level Weapon Imbuement
description:
Chargebreaker: While you wield this weapon, you have the following ability.

**Stop Right There**
üó≤ Their momentum, your impact.
Melee, Strike, Weapon
üìê Melee 1 ‚åñ One enemy

Trigger: The target willingly moves adjacent to you.
Effect: The target takes 5 damage.

name: Chilling II - 5th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Frozen bones from the lair of a white dragon

description: Chilling II: Whenever you damage a creature with an ability using this weapon and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature takes 5 cold damage and is slowed (save ends). This replaces the benefit of Chilling I.

name: Devastating - 5th-Level Weapon Imbuement

project_source.name: Texts or lore in High Kuric

description: Devastating: Whenever you make an ability roll using this weapon, the number you need to roll to score a critical hit is reduced by 1.

name: Disrupting II - 5th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A cutting from a century-old living tree in a graveyard

description: Disrupting II: Whenever you damage an undead using this weapon and leave that undead with 30 Stamina or less, they drop to 0 Stamina. This replaces the benefit of Disrupting I.

name: Metamorphic - 5th-Level Weapon Imbuement
description:
Metamorphic: You can change this weapon's shape and form as a maneuver, granting one of the following benefits of your choice:

‚Ä¢ Concealed: The weapon shrinks to the size of a piece of jewelry and can be worn as an article of clothing. While similar garb or accessories this form, the weapon can't be used for weapon abilities.
‚Ä¢ Large: Abilities using this weapon gain a +1 melee distance bonus or a +3 ranged distance bonus.
‚Ä¢ Vicious: Whenever you damage a creature using this weapon, you deal an extra 1 damage on a tier 1 outcome, an extra 2 damage on a tier 2 outcome, and an extra 3 damage on a tier 3 outcome.

name: Silencing - 5th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: An executioner's hood worn during the execution of a mage

project_source.name: Texts or lore in The First Language

description: Silencing: Whenever you damage a creature with an ability using this weapon and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature also can't use magic abilities until the end of their next turn.

name: Terrifying II - 5th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Riverbed silt harvested from the Abyssal Wasteland

description: Terrifying II: Whenever you damage a creature with an ability using this weapon and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature takes 4 psychic damage and is frightened (save ends). This replaces the benefit of Terrifying I.

name: Thundering II - 5th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: An iron rod charged by the death throes of an elemental of storms

project_source.name: Texts or lore in Low Kuric

description: Thundering II: Whenever you deal rolled damage to a creature using this weapon, you can push that creature up to 3 squares after the other effects of the ability resolve. If you retained a tier 3 outcome, the creature is also knocked prone after being pushed. This replaces the benefit of Thundering I.

name: Vengeance II - 5th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The remains of a sworn foe of the creature imbuing the item

description: Vengeance II: Whenever you use a damage-dealing ability using this weapon against a creature who has dealt damage to you since the end of your last turn, the ability deals an extra 4 damage. This replaces the benefit of Vengeance I.

name: Chilling III - 9th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The weapon must be dipped in the Glacial Forge in the coldest depths of Hell

description: Chilling III: Whenever you damage a creature with an ability using this weapon and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature takes 8 cold damage and is slowed (save ends). This replaces the benefit of Chilling II.

name: Disrupting III - 9th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: Wrappings from a mummy buried at least a century ago

description: Disrupting III: Whenever you damage an undead using this weapon and leave that undead with 50 Stamina or less, they immediately drop to 0 Stamina. If you instead leave the undead with 100 Stamina or less, they are frightened (save ends). This replaces the benefit of Disrupting II.

name: Draining - 9th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The intact, still-thinking brain of a voiceless talker

description: Draining: Whenever you damage a creature with an ability using this weapon and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature is also weakened (save ends). Each time you weaken a creature with this weapon, you gain 1 surge.

name: Imprisoning - 9th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A chain once used to restrain an angel

description: Imprisoning: Whenever you damage a creature with an ability using this weapon and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature is also restrained (save ends). While restrained in this way, the creature can't use magic or psionic abilities.

name: Nova - 9th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A piece of metal touched by a sun

description:
Nova: Whenever you damage a creature using this weapon, each enemy adjacent to you takes damage based on the tier outcome of the power roll‚Äî2 damage for tier 1, 6 for tier 2, or 10 for tier 3. Additionally, while you are winded, you have the following ability.

**Nova**
üó≤ I am an eternal flame, baby!
Area, Magic
üìê 3 area ‚åñ Each enemy in the area

Power Roll + Your Highest Characteristic Score:
‚Ä¢ 11 or lower: 7 fire damage
‚Ä¢ 12-16: 11 fire damage
‚Ä¢ 17+: 16 fire damage

name: Terrifying III - 9th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The central eye of an overmind

description: Terrifying III: Whenever you damage a creature with an ability using this weapon and obtain a tier 3 outcome, that creature takes 6 psychic damage and is frightened (save ends). This replaces the benefit of Terrifying II.

name: Thundering III - 9th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: An oracle of storms must willingly bless the weapon with lightning while it is being wielded and its wielder must survive this trial

project_source.name: Texts or lore in Low Kuric

description: Thundering III: Whenever you deal rolled damage to a creature using this weapon, you can push that creature up to 5 squares and knock them prone after the other effects of the ability resolve. If the creature takes or deals damage as a result of this movement, they also take 5 thunder damage. This replaces the benefit of Thundering II.

name: Vengeance III - 9th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: The true name of a devil who haunts other devils

description: Vengeance III: Whenever you use a damage-dealing ability using this weapon against a creature who has dealt damage to you since the end of your last turn, the ability deals an extra 6 damage. This replaces the benefit of Vengeance II.

name: Windcutting - 9th-Level Weapon Imbuement

item_prerequisite.name: A feather from a bird, once thought extinct, who dwells at the eye of an ever-whirling tornado

description: Windcutting: Whenever you use a melee signature ability that usually targets one creature, you can take a bane on the ability to target each enemy in a cube 3 within distance. If your signature ability would usually cause one target to become grabbed or restrained, each target in the area is instead slowed until the end of their next turn.
